AhriMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
AhriMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

AhriMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
AhriMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
AhriMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

AhriMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
AhriMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

AhriMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
AhriMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !AhriMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

AhriMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
AhriMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !AhriMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
